mapper.insert: insert into member(m_id, id, pw, mname, age, mphone,email, nickname) VALUES ('m_'||SEQ_PETMEMBER_NUM.nextval,#{id},#{pw},#{mname},#{age},#{mphone},#{email},#{nickname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
select count(*) from member where nickname = #{nickname}
select member.*, uploadpath||F_img.m_id||'_'||filename savePath from member, F_img where member.m_id = F_img.m_id and member.m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update P_member set pw = #{pw}, mName = #{mName}, mPhone = #{mPhone}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age} where m_id = #{m_id}
